00039 void ChannelAccess::initialize( int stage )
00040 {
00041   BatteryAccess::initialize(stage);
00042 
00043     if( stage == 0 ){
00044         hasPar("coreDebug") ? coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue() : coreDebug = false;
00045 
00046   // the phy module has to be named phy otherwise it cannot be found
00047   // TODO: maybe we can remove this
00048         // we need to look at the functions in NicEntry* for this
00049   if( strcmp( this->getName(), "phy" )!=0 )
00050       error("phy module has to be named \"phy\"!");
00051 
00052         cModule* nic = getParentModule();
00053         if (nic->hasPar("connectionManagerName")){
00054             cc = dynamic_cast<BaseConnectionManager *>(simulation.getModuleByPath(nic->par("connectionManagerName").stringValue()));
00055         } else {
00056             cc = FindModule<BaseConnectionManager *>::findGlobalModule();
00057         }
00058 
00059         if( cc == 0 ) error("Could not find connectionmanager module");
00060         // subscribe to position changes
00061         catMove = utility->subscribe(this, &move, findHost()->getId());
00062         isRegistered = false;
00063     }
00064 
00065     usePropagationDelay = par("usePropagationDelay");
00066 }

00077 void ChannelAccess::sendToChannel(cPacket *msg)
00078 {
00079     const NicEntry::GateList& gateList = cc->getGateList( getParentModule()->getId());
00080     NicEntry::GateList::const_iterator i = gateList.begin();
00081 
00082     if(useSendDirect){
00083         // use Andras stuff
00084         if( i != gateList.end() ){
00085           simtime_t delay = 0;
00086             for(; i != --gateList.end(); ++i){
00087               //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00088               delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00089 
00090                 int radioStart = i->second->getId();
00091                 int radioEnd = radioStart + i->second->size();
00092                 for (int g = radioStart; g != radioEnd; ++g)
00093                     sendDirect(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg->dup()),
00094                                delay, msg->getDuration(), i->second->getOwnerModule(), g);
00095             }
00096             //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00097       delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00098 
00099             int radioStart = i->second->getId();
00100             int radioEnd = radioStart + i->second->size();
00101             for (int g = radioStart; g != --radioEnd; ++g)
00102                 sendDirect(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg->dup()),
00103                            delay, msg->getDuration(), i->second->getOwnerModule(), g);
00104 
00105             sendDirect(msg, delay, msg->getDuration(), i->second->getOwnerModule(), radioEnd);
00106         }
00107         else{
00108             coreEV << "Nic is not connected to any gates!" << endl;
00109             delete msg;
00110         }
00111     }
00112     else{
00113         // use our stuff
00114         coreEV <<"sendToChannel: sending to gates\n";
00115         if( i != gateList.end() ){
00116           simtime_t delay = 0;
00117             for(; i != --gateList.end(); ++i){
00118               //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00119         delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00120 
00121                 sendDelayed( static_cast<cPacket*>(msg->dup()),
00122                              delay, i->second );
00123             }
00124             //calculate delay (Propagation) to this receiving nic
00125       delay = calculatePropagationDelay(i->first);
00126 
00127             sendDelayed( msg, delay, i->second );
00128         }
00129         else{
00130             coreEV << "Nic is not connected to any gates!" << endl;
00131             delete msg;
00132         }
00133     }
00134 }

00140 void ChannelAccess::receiveBBItem(int category, const BBItem *details, int scopeModuleId)
00141 {
00142   BatteryAccess::receiveBBItem(category, details, scopeModuleId);
00143 
00144     if(category == catMove)
00145     {
00146         Move m(*static_cast<const Move*>(details));
00147 
00148         if(isRegistered) {
00149             cc->updateNicPos(getParentModule()->getId(), &m.startPos);
00150         }
00151         else {
00152             // register the nic with ConnectionManager
00153             // returns true, if sendDirect is used
00154             useSendDirect = cc->registerNic(getParentModule(), this, &m.startPos);
00155             isRegistered = true;
00156         }
00157         move = m;
00158         coreEV<<"new HostMove: "<<move.info()<<endl;
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 simtime_t ChannelAccess::calculatePropagationDelay(const NicEntry* nic) {
00163   if(!usePropagationDelay)
00164     return 0;
00165 
00166   //receiver host move
00167   const Move& recvPos = nic->chAccess->move;
00168 
00169   // this is the time point when the transmission starts
00170   simtime_t actualTime = simTime();
00171 
00172   // this time-point is used to calculate the distance between sending and receiving host
00173   double distance = move.getPositionAt(actualTime).distance(recvPos.getPositionAt(actualTime));
00174 
00175   simtime_t delay = distance / BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight;
00176   return delay;
00177 }
